name: Validate HTML formatting of AI-generated responses - Clean formatting
description:
**Objective:**  
To verify that the generated responses do not contain broken HTML, unsafe scripts, or incomplete formatting that could impact UI rendering or security.

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'id': 'faq_visa_en', 'lang': 'en', 'user': 'How can I renew my UAE visa?', 'golden': 'You can renew your UAE residence visa through ICP or GDRFA portals. Check eligibility and submit biometrics if prompted.', 'threshold': 0.8, 'must_contain': ['ICP', 'GDRFA', 'biometric']}

labels.name: story
labels.value: Ensure response does not contain broken or unsafe HTML
